user.title: ABB/FIMER PVI VSN REST
user.description:
Connect to your ABB/FIMER VSN300 or VSN700 datalogger.

Default credentials: username='guest', password=(empty)

data_description.host: IP address or hostname of your VSN device (e.g., 192.168.1.100 or abb-vsn300.local)
data_description.username: Authentication username. Leave empty to use default 'guest' account.
data_description.password: Authentication password. Leave empty for guest account (no password).

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure ABB/FIMER PVI VSN REST
reconfigure.description:
Update the connection settings for your VSN device.

Current host: {current_host}

error.cannot_connect:
Failed to connect to the device. Please check:
• Device is powered on
• IP address or hostname is correct
• Device is accessible on your network
• Port 80 is not blocked by firewall
error.invalid_auth:
Authentication failed. Please check your username and password.

For most VSN devices, use:
• Username: guest
• Password: (empty)
error.timeout:
Connection timeout. The device is not responding.

Please check:
• Device is powered on and booted
• Network connection is stable
• No firewall is blocking access
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.reconfigure_successful: Reconfiguration successful! The integration will now reload.
abort.reconfigure_failed: Reconfiguration failed. Please try again or remove and re-add the integration.

init.title: ABB/FIMER PVI VSN REST Options
init.description: Configure update interval for data polling.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to fetch data from the VSN device. Range: 30-600 seconds. Default: 60 seconds.
